divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife was on her way home from work when she stopped for gas in Wildwood, Ga. After getting back on the interstate she noticed how bright the stars were in the sky and that's when she saw the orange orb. She says that it was shooting across the sky and not towards the earth. After just a few second a smaller orb detached from the main one and travled in the same direction before fading out of sight. My wife who usually doesn't want to talk about UFO's called me excited about what she had just seen. She also stated that it appeared to her to be moving to fast to be an aircraft and there are not any airports in the area.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Chattanooga

Summary: Orange orb shot across the sky before a smaller orb broke away from it
